Manx: Dooisht liorish leih Sinai ta,
Manx2: Dooisht liorish leigh Sinai ta,
English: Awoken by the Law of Sinai then,

Manx: My chree er crieau cre’n aght dy heay,
Manx2: My chree er creau; cre’n aght dy hea,
English: My heart a-tremble; how to flee,

Manx: Cha vell mee abyl gainsh,
Manx2: Cha vel mee abyl ginsh,
English: I cannot tell.

Manx: Goo Yee gainsh dou lesh naghtyn throme,
Manx2: Goo Yee ginsh dou lesh naightyn trome,
English: God’s word tells me with heavy news,

Manx: She nuirin heesh veen currit ayn,
Manx2: She nuirin heese veign currit ayn,
English: It is Hell below I would be put in,

Manx: Mannagh been ruggyt reesht.
Manx2: Mannagh beign ruggit reesht.
English: Unless I would be born again.

Manx: She gys yn leih esht hie mee rooam.
Manx2: She gys yn leigh eisht hie mee roym,
English: It is to the law then that I went,

Manx: As eash ny fea cha dooar mee ayn,
Manx2: As aash ny fea cha dooar mee ayn,
English: And neither ease or rest did I find there,

Manx: As fegoish myghhyn neesht.
Manx2: As fegooish myghin neesht,
English: And no mercy either.

Manx: Yn leih va brish esht cha row saase,
Manx2: Yn leigh va brisht eisht cha row saase,
English: The law was broken therefore there was

Manx: Dy chosney myghyn shee ne graase,
Manx2: Dy chosney myghin, shee, ny grayse,
English: No means to earn mercy, peace or grace,

Manx: Fegoish ve ruggyt reesht.
Manx2: Fegooish ve ruggit reesht.
English: Without being born again.

Manx: She Nooghyn Yee easht cheayl mee gra,
Manx2: She nooghyn Yee eisht cheayl mee gra,
English: It was God’s Saints then that I heard say,

Manx: Dy row ad glen veih dagh peccah,
Manx2: Dy row ad glen veih dagh peccah,
English: That they where purified of every sin,

Manx: Trooid fuill deyr Yeesey Chreest,
Manx2: Trooid fuill deyr Yeesey Chreest,
English: Through Jesus Christs’s dear blood,

Manx: She shoh dy lheay ren gherjagh mee,
Manx2: She shoh dy leah ren gerjagh mee,
English: It is this that soon consoled me,

Manx: Esht deiye mee er lesh slane my chree,
Manx2: Eisht deie mee er lesh slane my chree,
English: Then I called out for it with all my heart,

Manx: As hooar mee ruggyt reesht.
Manx2: As hooar mee ruggit reesht.
English: And I got born again.

Manx: Yn seaghyn throme shoh ver my chree,
Manx2: Yn seaghyn trome shoh v’er my chree,
English: This heavy sorrow that was upon my heart,

Manx: Yeesey dy Nazareth, yn fer lhiee,
Manx2: Yeesey dy Nazareth, yn fer lhee,
English: Jesus of Nazareth, the doctor,

Manx: Ayns myghyn as erreeish,
Manx2: Ayns myghin as erreeish,
English: In mercy and compassion,

Manx: Ta trooid y uill er hearey mee,
Manx2: Ta trooid e uill er hayrey mee,
English: That has freed me through his blood

Manx: Nish ver vm mooylley dhyt my Yee,
Manx2: Nish verrym moylley dhyt my Yee,
English: Now I will give you praise, my God,

Manx: Dy veil mee ruggyt, raesht.
Manx2: Dy vel mee ruggit reesht.
English: That I am born, again.

Manx: Gys Paradise hie niagh gherjoil,
Manx2: Gys Paradise hie naight gerjoil,
English: To Paradise, happy news went,

Manx: As ooilley Niau ren throggal kiaul,
Manx2: As ooilley Niau ren toggal kiaull,
English: And All of heaven raised music,

Manx: Nooghyn as Ainleyn neesht,
Manx2: Nooghyn as ainleyn neesht,
English: Saints and Angels too,

Manx: Chur glooyr da’n Eayn ve’r Calvary,
Manx2: Chur gloyr da’n Eayn ve’r Calvary,
English: Sent glory to the Lamb who was on Calvary,

Manx: As ghoaill thousaanyn seose gys jee,
Manx2: As goaill thousaneyn seose gys jee,
English: And took thousands up to God,

Manx: Liorish ve ruggyt reesht.
Manx2: Liorish ve ruggit reesht.
English: By being born again.
